comments.body: I left nitk civil for pes
I left nitk civil for pes
oh yah I can get civil also
PES - for anyone who has plan to pursue masters, doing Btech in same branch will make a big difference
Does aiml in pes count as same branch as cs
yes and no - 90+% sylabus overlap is there, so yes. However there are some universities especially in Europe which are particular about CSE and don't accept AIML as same.
cse is in pes is a no brainer if u want to do Ms abroad either way.

Even if coursework is same ? Pes has literally 100% same syllabus except electives. Also how many unis we talking abt? Anything that will make a significant difference in the future ? I gotta pick between rr aiml and ec cs. Rr has a shorter travel time for me

I would say weigh your options independent of MS eligibility and decide (as that is not so big a concern to choose between CS and CS AIML). 

BTW, what is your KCET rank, if you are ok to share? Did you give PESSAT as well?
The syllabus is exactly the same.Timings are far better in rr and overall flexibility and crowd is too.
